name: CreateSmtpApiToken
description:
Creates a SMTP API token for transaction emails.

This tool is used to create a new SMTP API token for sending transactional emails through HubSpot's marketing service. It should be called when a new token is needed for email operations.

parameters.name: campaign_name
parameters.description: The name of the campaign associated with the SMTP API token.

value_schema.description: A name for the campaign tied to the SMTP API token.

parameters.name: create_contact_for_recipients
parameters.description: Indicates whether a contact should be created for email recipients. Set to true to create a contact.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether a contact should be created for email recipients.
